name: Reed Flower Lure
description: The Reed Flower Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Reed Flower Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.
